name: .SBFRES File Extension
summary: Learn about .SBFRES files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: A variety of fan-made utilities allow The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild players to open SBFRES files and convert them to more common image file formats. For a detailed walkthrough of one way you can decompress, convert, and edit SBFRES files click here.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
